channel.title: Question
channel.description:
Well i know this is a stupid question but i was wondering how to edit the text you speak ingame.
Such as my client makes me speak in purple but i want to change it to green.
This is a visible text to all people meaning when i type a word and press enter the chat gets altered to purple so all can see purple chat.
----------
Question:
How do i change my visible talking text from purple to green? What files and where.

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

well for one it might be your client your using.

if not your client… idk mate… lol
